The HSQE Manager will develop and responsible to produce process of assessing jobsite or working place activities on safety, safety standards execution, safety inspections, safety training and ensuring compliance by all employees and (sub)contractors with Giant and client standards in order to cut safety incidents down constantly in jobsite or any working area.

Key Responsibilities/Job Roles
1. HSQE Manager shall carry out his roles and duties as per statutory requirements and GIANT HEAVY MACHINERY SERVICE HSQE MANAGERS.

Provide training on legal and other requirements, HSQE advisories and lesson learnt and document the training records.

4. Guide PM in setting HSQE Specific Measurable Achievable Realistic, Time bounded (SMART) objectives and programs in line with the GIANT HEAVY MACHINERY SERVICE vision.

5. Ensure that Subcontractors/suppliers are well aware of GIANT HEAVY MACHINERY SERVICE HSQE requirements.

6. Regularly monitor the site and offices, services, audit including Sub Contractors and advise an area for improvements.

7. Issue Improvement/Prohibition Notices and assist the PM in the GIANT HEAVY MACHINERY SERVICE promotion schemes.

8. Liaise with Client/HSQE bodies; promote GIANT HEAVY MACHINERY SERVICE HSQE culture.

9. Carry out incident investigations (depending on the severity of incident) along with the assistance of site management, train the site management and advise the underlying causes with corrective/preventive solutions.

10. Review of method statements and risk assessments.

＊上班地點：我們採區域排班，原則上在編製店上班，但會需要因為友店需要支援而跨店上班。
＊上班時間：每日上班9小時(內含有一小時休息間，原則上每四小時休息30分鐘，休息時間根據門市現況調配) 。

▍【薪資制度】
〘獨一無二的薪資制度〙
＊我們定期進行薪資服務檢核，以零售連鎖業市場的『前25%』為薪酬標準。

▍【企業優勢】
★月休8~13天的休假制度(含國定假日全年休假天數平均挪調)。
★完善工作培訓制度及教育訓練規劃給您學習成長的機會。

歡迎挑戰閃耀新星計畫-許自己更好的未來~不用羨慕別人薪水比你好!

▍【福利】

4.好幾百萬等級的尾牙及聚餐活動獲補助(大獎中獎率達20%、全員通通有獎、通路中最優) 。
